728043f-a.text:
31-80 Steinway Street, adjoining the N.W. corner of Broadway, showing one of the James Butler grocery stores.
MAY BE REPRODUCED  About 1927

728042f-a.text:
Steinway St., (right) at the S.E. corner of Broadway (left), showing the Daufkirchs Astoria Casino. In 1891 it was also known as Schnetzen Park. A group of four story structures occupied the site of this park
in 1928.
April 1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
